title: RPGitem插件的应用，求助
author: shuyijian
txt_content: 怎么给物品添加一个效果，右键即可获得领取地皮的权限plotme.use

replies.author: 幻境雲達達
replies.txt_content: /rpgitem 名字 power command 冷却时间 right 右键获取地皮权限 `/manuaddp {player} plotme.use` *

replies.author: chenyuanzhe
replies.txt_content:
/rpgitem 物品名字 power command 冷却 right '/manuaddp {player} plotme.use'
应该是这样不行再回复我

replies.author: shuyijian
replies.txt_content:
